description: Default Coder One statusLine template for all users

usage_instructions.manual_setup: Copy the statusLine value to your ~/.claude/settings.json file
usage_instructions.automatic_setup: This template will be automatically applied during Coder One onboarding
usage_instructions.customization: Users can modify individual components while maintaining Coder One branding

notes: The statusLine provides consistent branding across all Coder One sessions
Shows current project context, git branch, time, and AI model
Gracefully handles projects without git repositories
Uses environment variable MODEL_NAME if available, falls back to 'Claude'
